DOC.detailed_description: OSKIRA-ABPM : A Multi-Centre , Randomised , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel Group Study Effect Fostamatinib 100 mg Twice Daily 24-hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure Patients Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 18 diagnosed rheumatoid arthritis age 16 Active rheumatoid arthritis define : ≥4 swollen joint ≥4 tender/painful joint ( 28 joint count ) either erythrocyte sedimentation rate ≥28 mm/h , Creactive protein ≥10 mg/L . Currently take one follow diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug : methotrexate , sulfasalazine , hydroxychloroquine chloroquine . Patients without essential hypertension essential hypertension blood pressure control ( < 140/90 mmHg ) antihypertensive medication stable least 4 week prior randomisation . Females pregnant breastfeeding . Certain inflammatory condition ( rheumatoid arthritis ) , connective tissue diseases chronic pain disorder History liver problem require previous investigation Evidence tuberculosis infection Conditions preclude render difficult 24hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring technique .
